Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the number of homes and yachts owned by John Kerry.
Lack enough support: The claim is based on a "copypasta" meme circulating on social media without any accompanying supporting evidence.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that all the property mentioned belongs solely to John Kerry, when in fact, most of the homes and the jet belong to his wife.
Exist alternative explanation: The expert provides an alternative explanation for the ownership of the properties, stating that Kerry's wife, Teresa Heinz Kerry, is the heiress to the Heinz ketchup fortune and owns most of the properties.
